name: Tesco Loves Baby Esy Fit Size 4 Maxi Carry Pack 22
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave /><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen /></Cooking_Instructions><Directions>Care instructions: Ensure you have everything you need to hand before every nappy change. Tear away the side seams to remove your baby's soiled pants. Gently wipe your baby clean with a wipe or cotton wool before putting on fresh pants. Why not try encouraging your baby to pull their pants up themselves? Remember that keeping a dry nappy on your baby will help keep them comfortable and prevent nappy rash. Always dispose of your nappy responsibly by placing it in a nappy bag and disposing of it with normal household waste. Never flush nappies down the toilet. Never leave your baby unattended on the changing table or put a mat on with a raised surface to change your baby.</Directions><Dosage>NA </Dosage><Care_Instructions>Our promise to you - We are happy to refund or replace any Tesco product which falls below the high standard you expect. Just ask any member of staff. This does not affect your statutory rights. We are here to help: Tesco Stores Ltd., Cheshunt EN8 9SL, U.K. Freephone 0800 50 55 55, Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm, Shop on-line at www.tesco.com</Care_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: £12.50 off when you spend £50 or more on selected Baby products (excludes infant milk)
